::DevilDuer/Bloodystrike/Reptilica::

Bloodystrike nods, slinging Life over his other shoulder and
motioning 
for Amp to follow. He sets off after Squizzy, entering the CR room.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer grins at Diamond's last comment, blushing a bit. "Well, ya 
made quite an entrance here. Gave us lotsa scrap metal t' use in the 
future."

They reach the CR chambers at the same time that Bloodystrike enters. 
Bloodystrike walks to the CR chambers, putting Life in one and 
Reptilica in the other. DevilDuer motions to the remaining CR.

"That one's for ya to use," he says, "Ya'll be out in no time, then
we 
can get ya registered as an Alliance member an' all."






--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Diamond::
> She smiled, rather pleased with herself thus far."Well, as I had 
> said, I came all the way from Cybertron.  I was under the command
of 
> the High Predacon Council.  I was desined and created as an 
assassin. 
> I killed many high Maximal officials. but the one that got me
almost 
> killed was the assassination of Quantis.  I killed him and then my 
> leaders turned me into the maximal authorities.  I was to be tried 
> and killed. But I escaped.  The last thing I remember was my ship 
> getting sucked into a black hole. After that, I remember nothing 
> untill I woke up in your arms."  she smiled at him, "Which I aim to 
> thank you properly for later on."
> 
> Squizzy::
> She tried her best to help all three of them to the lab.  She got 
the 
> last three chambers ready. "OK all, just step in and in no time 
flat, 
> you'll be as good as new."  she said in a cheerful voice.  She 
> wondered how she went from protoform and DNA engineer to hospital
